item.title: Helping a Stuck Car with the Tractor
item.description: A car gets stuck, and the tractor steps in to help. A straightforward look at how the situation is handled safely and efficiently on the farm.

media:content.media:title: Helping a Stuck Car with the Tractor
media:content.media:description: A car gets stuck, and the tractor steps in to help. A straightforward look at how the situation is handled safely and efficiently on the farm.

item.title: Pickup Work at Sunset
item.description: A peaceful end to the day as pickup work continues under a glowing sunset. A calm look at evening chores and the beauty of farm life after hours.

item.title: Cheap Auction Peterbilt: First Load
item.description: Taking the newly purchased auction Peterbilt out for its first load. See how the truck handles the job and what needs attention after its debut run.

item.title: Didn’t Expect It to Be This Small
item.description: A surprising farm discovery turns out much smaller than anticipated. A quick look at the unexpected find and what it means for the day’s work.

item.title: The Mini Tractor in Action
item.description: A fun look at a small but mighty tractor helping out on the farm. See how this compact machine handles everyday tasks with ease.

item.title: Just a Normal Day on the Farm
item.description: A look at an everyday farm routine—from chores to equipment checks and everything in between. A simple, honest glimpse into daily life in the field.

item.title: Inside a Combine Harvester
item.description: Take a guided look inside a combine harvester and see how this essential machine gathers, separates, and moves grain during harvest.

item.title: Planting Resilience on the Farm
item.description: A look at the determination it takes to keep a farm thriving. Follow the journey of building skills, facing challenges, and growing stronger with every season.

item.title: Meet My Small Furry Visitor
item.description: A surprise furry guest shows up on the farm. See how this tiny visitor turns a routine moment into a fun and unexpected encounter.

item.title: A Tractor, a Batwing, and a Day in the Field
item.description: Join a farm day running the tractor and batwing shredder. A look at the work, the equipment, and the satisfaction of keeping the fields in shape.

item.title: Dealing with a Stuck Pivot
item.description: A closer look at a pivot that refuses to move. See what caused the issue and how it’s safely handled to keep the field running smoothly.

item.title: Tougher Job Than Expected
item.description: A look at a farm task that turned out to be more challenging than planned. See what made the job harder and how the issue was handled safely.

item.title: Working Safely Around Water and Electricity
item.description: A look at how water and electrical systems interact on the farm, highlighting safe handling practices and the steps taken to prevent hazards during routine work.

item.title: Rethinking the Oil Change Routine
item.description: A look at how new equipment or updated maintenance systems can reduce traditional oil changes, explaining what this means for long-term care on the farm.

item.title: Organizing the Farm Tools
item.description: A look at sorting and arranging tools around the farm, creating a cleaner, more efficient workspace for daily tasks and equipment maintenance.

item.title: Stop Buying Tools!
item.description: A look at why constantly buying new tools isn’t always necessary, and how choosing the right equipment — or using what you already have — can be more efficient and cost-effective.

item.title: Today is the Day!
item.description: Laura tackles an oil change on her own, walking through the steps and getting the job done out in the shop.

item.title: Seed Fields are Being Harvested Today!
item.description: The crew begins harvesting the seed fields, gathering the crop and moving through the fields as the day’s work gets underway.

item.title: Driving a Semi Truck For The First Time
item.description: Laura gets behind the wheel of a semi truck for the first time, learning how it handles and taking on the challenge of driving a much bigger vehicle.

item.title: One of the Most Satisfying Things!
item.description: A machine moves through the field to neatly separate and mark the corn rows, creating clean, uniform lines that are surprisingly satisfying to watch.
